product_name: Mammut Element Barryvox Avalanche Rescue Kit
long_description: The Element Barryvox Avalanche Rescue Kit includes the Element Barryvox transceiver, the Alugator Light shovel and a 240cm avalanche probe to get you geared up for backcountry travel.
short_description: The Element Barryvox Avalanche Rescue Kit includes the Element Barryvox transceiver, the Alugator Light shovel and a 240cm avalanche probe to get you geared up for backcountry travel.
